2-layer model graphsage + lstm
Betty without re-partition
Number of batches < 9, OOM ;
Number of batches >= 9, break OOM; 

num of batch || compute eff || total nodes for computation/pure train time
9,           ||  1338305.93 ||  5766840.83   || 4.3 sec
                                                (average the 1-4 epoch, exclude the 0 epoch time)



the first epoch time is not accurate

16, 1119648.526223139
17, 1156783.6110290925
18, 1205750.2077500315

when number of batches =19, the largest computation efficiency.

data ={9: 21.206923484802246, 10: 19.308246612548828, 16: 12.36390733718872, 17: 12.214770317077637, 18: 11.358423709869385, 19: 10.85377311706543, 20: 10.54200029373169, 32: 7.051362991333008, 64: 3.792025089263916}

y=list(data.values())
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.show()
